dcterms:creator: C. Raffel
dcterms:description: A dataset containing approximately one hundred thousand songs in the MIDI data format, which includes messages like 'note on', 'note off', and 'change tempo'. It is beneficial for training neural networks due to its smaller size compared to audio files.
dcterms:title: Lakh MIDI Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the Lakh MIDI Dataset, where the songs have been shifted to the same root note C to simplify the music generation task.
dcterms:title: Shifted Dataset

dcterms:description: Another dataset derived from the Lakh MIDI Dataset, which retains the original key of the songs without shifting.
dcterms:title: Original Unshifted Dataset
